basic_info.name: CAFICAFE
basic_info.description: We started with one simple goal: to serve delicious, honest meals that bring people together. Inspired by local flavors and global influences, we created a space where everyone from students and tourists to families and foodies can find something they love.

location.directions: Located in the heart of downtown, easily accessible by public transport. Just a 5-minute walk from the university campus.

methods: Online reservation system on our website
policies: Reservations recommended for groups of 4 or more
Student groups get priority booking on weekdays

features: Free WiFi for students and customers
